com.engineersbox.httpproxy.formatting.content

Class ContentFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.engineersbox.httpproxy.formatting.content.ContentFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseContentFormatter

    public class ContentFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
implements BaseContentFormatter
    Implementation of BaseContentFormatter using Jsoup to replace matching patterns in text and title attributes of HTML nodes/elements.
